- Location: Interior view of a white vinyl double-hung window with full-screen.  
- Screen: Mesh screen intact; no tears; frame appears taut.  
- Glass: No cracks observed; minor surface smudges/dust.  
- Frame/track: Vinyl frame and bottom sash track in good condition; no visible warping or gaps.  
- Exterior condition: Wooden privacy fence close to window; monitor for moisture exposure and insect access; ensure clearance.
